Key Match Events: Dawid Malan hit 16 fours and five sixes during his 140 from 107 against Bangladesh.
Malan's match-defining 140 came from 107 balls and featured 21 boundaries, including five maximums.
England secured a crushing win over Bangladesh in Dharamsala.
Post-Match Reflections: Dawid Malan expressed his determination to keep silencing critics by scoring runs and contributing to wins.
Malan reflected on the competition for places in the England squad and his disappointment of missing out on the 2022 T20 World Cup final due to injury.
Malan hopes to stay fit and help England play good cricket to reach the business end of the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England moved up to fifth in the table with their win over Bangladesh.
England aims to become the third team in history to retain the men's Cricket World Cup trophy after West Indies and Australia.
